profile.name: Scott Chacon
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | @gitbutlerapp
profile.summary: Highly skilled developer with a passion for systems programming and scalable database solutions. Proficient in Rust, shell scripting, and C programming.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of GitButler, a popular version control tool for teams.
Designed and implemented scalable database solutions using PlanetScale.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-performance systems.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including a popular shell scripting framework.
Provided freelance services to clients in the tech industry, focusing on Ruby and C programming.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to multiple open-source projects, including a popular version control system.
Participated in code reviews and ensured the quality of the project's codebase.
